skills_descriptions.name: Long Sward
skills_descriptions.simple_description: Increase Attack
skills_descriptions.full_description: + !X! % attack

skills_descriptions.name: 圆盾
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 提升生命值
skills_descriptions.full_description: + !X! %生命值

skills_descriptions.name: 战斧
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 大幅提升攻击力
skills_descriptions.full_description: + !X! %攻击力

skills_descriptions.name: 神圣护盾
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 提升防御力与生命值
skills_descriptions.full_description:
+ !X! %防御力 
+ !Y! %生命值

skills_descriptions.name: 追月者
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 提升攻击力与射程
skills_descriptions.full_description:
+ !X! %攻击力 
+ !Y! 攻击范围

skills_descriptions.name: 海妖杀手
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 提升攻击力。每3次攻击造成双倍伤害。
skills_descriptions.full_description:
+ !X! %攻击力。
每3次攻击造成双倍伤害。

skills_descriptions.name: 封印太阳
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 吟唱数秒然后爆炸攻击周围区域。期间每获得1点法力都会提升爆炸半径与伤害。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 吟唱 !X! 秒然后爆炸攻击周围区域，造成 !D! %攻击力的伤害。期间每获得1点法力都会提升爆炸半径与伤害。

skills_descriptions.name: 高空哨塔
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 被动：哨塔投弹具有永久的无实体。
skills_descriptions.full_description:
被动：哨塔投弹手具有永久的无实体。
无实体：不能被攻击，也不能阻拦敌人。

skills_descriptions.name: 光耀
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 被动：攻击时会使敌人获得失明，具有失明的敌人攻击只能造成1点伤害，然后其对失明免疫。
skills_descriptions.full_description:
被动：攻击时会使敌人获得 !X! 层失明与失明免疫。
失明：攻击只能造成1点伤害。每次触发，层数-1。

skills_descriptions.name: 流星雨
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 召唤流星雨攻击数个随机敌人。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 召唤流星雨攻击战场上的 !X! 个随机敌人，对每个敌人造成 !D! %攻击力的伤害。

skills_descriptions.name: 火焰吐息
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 朝前方喷出一个大火球，伤害、燃烧与击退所有击中的敌人。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 朝前方喷出一个大火球，对所有击中的敌人造成 !D! %攻击力的伤害、伤害数值 !X! %层数的燃烧以及弱击退。

skills_descriptions.name: 风烟渐染
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 被动：减缓元素活性的衰减速度。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 被动：元素活性的衰减量减少 !X! %。

skills_descriptions.name: 寂灭
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 随机惩戒一个敌人，对其造成波生命值的伤害。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 随机惩戒一个敌人，对其造成波生命值的伤害。

skills_descriptions.name: 微光粉尘
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 给予一片区域的敌人中毒。
skills_descriptions.full_description:
给予一个敌人和其周围的敌人 !D! %攻击力的中毒。
中毒：每秒受到中毒层数的伤害。

skills_descriptions.name: 不灭存在
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 获得永恒层数。永恒能减免99%受到的伤害。
skills_descriptions.full_description:
获得 !X! 层永恒。
永恒：减免99%受到的伤害，每次发动其数值-1。

skills_descriptions.name: 弑君
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 被动：BOSS出现时，对其造成大量伤害。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 被动：BOSS出现时，对其造成 !D! %攻击力的伤害。

skills_descriptions.name: 星界躯体
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 获得吸收层数。吸收能使受到的伤害降低至最大生命值的10%。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 获得 !X! 层吸收。吸收能使受到的伤害降低至最大生命值的10%。

skills_descriptions.name: The Stopwatch
skills_descriptions.simple_description: Passive: attacks has a chance to teleport the enemy to the entrance. Can only trigger once per enemy.
skills_descriptions.full_description: Passive: attacks has !X! % chance to teleport the enemy back to the entrance. Can only trigger once per enemy.

skills_descriptions.name: 唤潮
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 使用时降低所有能力的冷却。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 使所有能力的冷却时间降低 !X! 秒。

skills_descriptions.name: 元素汇聚
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 被动：所有友军法力回复加快。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 被动：每秒为所有友军恢复 !X! 法力值。

skills_descriptions.name: 旋风斩
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 斩击周围的区域，对所有敌人造成伤害与易伤。
skills_descriptions.full_description:
斩击周围的区域，对所有敌人造成 !D! %攻击力伤害与 !X! 层易伤。
易伤：受到伤害增加50%。每有1层易伤，额外提升1%。每次触发，层数-1。

skills_descriptions.name: 巨石投掷
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 被动：攻击速度减慢，攻击会给予敌人弱击退。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 被动：攻击速度减少 !X! 。攻击会给予敌人力量为 !Y! 的弱击退。

skills_descriptions.name: 夺心黑暗
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 被动：攻击使敌人获得黑暗沁染。这会提升其之后受到的伤害。
skills_descriptions.full_description:
被动：攻击使敌人获得 !X! 层黑暗沁染。
黑暗沁染：每有1层黑暗沁染，受到伤害增加1%。不会消除。

skills_descriptions.name: 爪击
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 撕咬屏幕上的数个敌人。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 撕咬屏幕上的 !X! 个随机敌人，造成 !D! %攻击力伤害。

skills_descriptions.name: 撕咬
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 撕咬一个敌人，使其受到伤害并获得流血。
skills_descriptions.full_description:
撕咬小范围的敌人，使其受到 !D! %攻击力的伤害并获得 !X! 层流血。
流血：每有1层流血，每秒受到等同于波生命值1%的伤害。

skills_descriptions.name: 灵魂锻造
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 被动：前一格的友军获得防御力提升。后一格的友军获得攻击力与射程提升。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 被动：前一格的友军提升 !X! %防御力。后一格的友军提升 !X! %攻击力与射程。

skills_descriptions.name: 寒霜
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 被动：攻击会使敌人获得冰冷。冰冷会减少敌人的移动速度与攻击速度。
skills_descriptions.full_description:
被动：攻击会使敌人获得 !X! 层冰冷。
冰冷：每有1层冰冷，行动速度降低1%。每秒层数-1。

skills_descriptions.name: 恩典
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 大幅治疗一名友方符灵，并使其获得相同层数的再生。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 为一名友方符灵恢复 !D! %攻击力的生命值，并使其获得相同层数的再生。

skills_descriptions.name: Rage Fire
skills_descriptions.simple_description:
被动：攻击会使敌人燃烧，造成持续伤害。对已经被燃烧的目标必定触发爆炸攻击。
燃烧：每秒受到等同于层数的伤害。每次发动其数值减半。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 被动：攻击会使敌人获得 !D! %攻击力的燃烧，造成持续伤害。对已经被燃烧的目标必定触发爆炸攻击。

skills_descriptions.name: Web Building
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 被动：敌人生成时有几率向其发射蜘蛛网，使其受到伤害并获得晕眩与易伤。对BOSS必定触发。
skills_descriptions.full_description:
被动：敌人生成时有 !Y! %几率向其发射蜘蛛网，给予其 !D! %攻击力伤害与 !X! 层晕眩与易伤。对BOSS必定触发。
晕眩：具有晕眩的单位无法行动。每秒层数-1。

skills_descriptions.name: Death Curse
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 被动：攻击会诅咒敌人，使其死亡后有几率被奴役。
skills_descriptions.full_description:
被动：攻击会诅咒敌人，使其获得 !X! 层奴役。
奴役：死亡后，每有1层奴役便有1%几率暂时变为友方单位战斗。

skills_descriptions.name: Breathe of Destruction
skills_descriptions.simple_description: Passive: attacks are granteed to attach explosiveattacks.
skills_descriptions.full_description: Passive: attacks are granteed to attach explosiveattacks with range of !X!.

skills_descriptions.name: Light Chisel
skills_descriptions.simple_description: Passive: trigger a few mining effects on killing enemies.
skills_descriptions.full_description: Passive: trigger !X! % mining effects on killing enemies.

skills_descriptions.name: Chain Lightning
skills_descriptions.simple_description: Passive: attacks are granteed to attach bounceattacks.
skills_descriptions.full_description: Passive: attacks are granteed to attach !X! bounceattacks.

skills_descriptions.name: Bone Shot
skills_descriptions.simple_description: Shoot a lot of scattering targetless arrows.
skills_descriptions.full_description: 快速向敌人射出共 !X! 发散射箭矢，每发箭矢造成 !D! %攻击力伤害。

skills_descriptions.name: Belssing
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 被动：每秒为所有友军恢复生命值。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 被动：每秒为所有友军恢复 !X! 加上 !H! %生命值的生命值。

skills_descriptions.name: Shell
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 被动：血量小于一半时获得大量伤害减免。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 被动：血量小于一半时获得 !X! %伤害减免。

skills_descriptions.name: The Masterwork
skills_descriptions.simple_description: Passive: trigger mining effects on end of each wave.
skills_descriptions.full_description: Passive: trigger !X! % mining effects on end of each wave.

skills_descriptions.name: Deft
skills_descriptions.simple_description: 被动：提升攻击力与攻击速度。
skills_descriptions.full_description: 被动：提升 !X! 攻击力与 !Y! 攻击速度。

skills_descriptions.name: Skeleton Summoning
skills_descriptions.simple_description: summon skeletion(s) on the enemy half.
skills_descriptions.full_description: summon !X! skeletion(s) on the enemy half, each has !D! % attack and health.

skills_descriptions.name: Rapid Shot
skills_descriptions.simple_description: Shoot an arrow to enemy quickly.
skills_descriptions.full_description: Shoot an arrow to enemy quickly, deals !D! % damage.

skills_descriptions.name: Moon Befall
skills_descriptions.simple_description: Passive: attacks are granteed to attach multiattacks.
skills_descriptions.full_description: Passive: attacks attach !X! multiattacks.

skills_descriptions.name: Heavy Strike
skills_descriptions.simple_description: Deal Massive damage to an enemy and stuns them.
skills_descriptions.full_description:
Deal !D! % damage to an enemy and apply !X! stun. 
stun: units with stun are incapable of any actions. Stacks -1 every second.

kinds_descriptions.name: Warrior
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该职业的符灵以提升 !X! 加上 !Y! %的护甲值。

kinds_descriptions.name: Warlock
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该职业的符灵以在造成伤害时恢复 !X! 生命值。

kinds_descriptions.name: Priest
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 周围有可被治疗的友军时，牧师的攻击会改为治疗它们。集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该职业的符灵以允许进行过量治疗,最多达到 !X! 倍。

kinds_descriptions.name: Marksman
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该职业的符灵以提升 !Y! %攻击力与 !X! 射程。

kinds_descriptions.name: Mage
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该职业的符灵以使你的所有符灵减少释放主动技能所需的法力值 !X! 点。

kinds_descriptions.name: Knight
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该职业的符灵以获得 !X! %伤害减免。

kinds_descriptions.name: Judger
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该职业的符灵以使你的所有符灵获得 !X! 额外生命值。

kinds_descriptions.name: Craftman
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该种族的符灵以获得 !X! 等级战线能力。

kinds_descriptions.name: Assassin
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该职业的符灵以提升 !X! %暴击几率与 !Y! %暴击伤害。

kinds_descriptions.name: Beast
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该种族的符灵以使你的所有符灵提升 !X! 攻击速度。

kinds_descriptions.name: Dark
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该种族的符灵，便有 !X! %几率闪避敌人的攻击。

kinds_descriptions.name: Dragon
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该种族的符灵以获得 !X! 等级金色棋盘能力。

kinds_descriptions.name: Elemental
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 元素造成、受到伤害或击杀敌人时，获得元素活性。元素活性会增强元素符灵的技能，但会随着时间衰减。集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该种族的符灵以使获得的元素活性 * !X! 。

kinds_descriptions.name: Human
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该种族的符灵以获得 !X! 等级点金手能力。

kinds_descriptions.name: Mech
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该职业的符灵以获得 !X! 等级闪电球能力。

kinds_descriptions.name: Ocean
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该种族的符灵以获得 !X! 等级潮汐祈唤能力。

kinds_descriptions.name: Transcendence
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 只有一种该种族符灵时使其飞升，其攻击力、生命值与护甲变为1.5倍。

kinds_descriptions.name: Undead
kinds_descriptions.simple_description: 集齐 !AMOUNT! 种不同的该种族的符灵以提升 !X! %速度。速度会提升大多数能力值。

node_descriptions.name: 工作室攻击强化
node_descriptions.simple_description: 提升基础等级（不会提升价格）
node_descriptions.full_description: 工作室攻击 基础等级

node_descriptions.name: 工作室攻击速度强化
node_descriptions.simple_description: 提升基础等级（不会提升价格）
node_descriptions.full_description: 工作室攻击速度 基础等级

node_descriptions.name: 工作室生命值强化
node_descriptions.simple_description: 提升基础等级（不会提升价格）
node_descriptions.full_description: 工作室生命值 基础等级

node_descriptions.name: 工作室护甲强化
node_descriptions.simple_description: 提升基础等级（不会提升价格）
node_descriptions.full_description: 工作室护甲 基础等级

node_descriptions.name: 回归
node_descriptions.simple_description: 重置科技树和资源，获得星

enemy_descriptions.name: 保护者
enemy_descriptions.simple_description: 保护附近的其它敌人，使其受到伤害减半。

enemy_descriptions.name: BOSS
enemy_descriptions.simple_description: 生命值极高，缓慢而难以阻挡。击败后获得特别的奖励。

enemy_descriptions.name: 远程
enemy_descriptions.simple_description: 能进行远程攻击的敌人。

enemy_descriptions.name: 分裂
enemy_descriptions.simple_description: 死亡后分裂为数个生命值更低、体型更小的敌人。

enemy_descriptions.name: 护盾
enemy_descriptions.simple_description: 拥有等于最大生命的护盾。护盾存在时受到减益效果减半。

enemy_descriptions.name: 坦克
enemy_descriptions.simple_description: 生命值很高的敌人。移动速度缓慢。

enemy_descriptions.name: 快速
enemy_descriptions.simple_description: 快速移动的敌人。更加脆弱。

enemy_descriptions.name: 基本
enemy_descriptions.simple_description: 各方面能力都很普通的敌人。

ability_descriptions.name: 潮汐祈唤
ability_descriptions.simple_description:
召唤巨大的潮汐席卷整个战场，造成你DPS !X! %的伤害与强击退。
冷却时间 !CD! 秒。

ability_descriptions.name: 点金手
ability_descriptions.simple_description:
将一名随机敌人转化为黄金。其立即死亡，获得 !X! 倍$与灵魂。
冷却时间 !CD! 秒。

ability_descriptions.name: 闪电球
ability_descriptions.simple_description:
游荡在战场上的闪电球，打击附近的敌人，每次造成你DPS !X! %的伤害。
每次攻击冷却时间 !CD! 秒。

ability_descriptions.name: 金色棋盘
ability_descriptions.simple_description:
将战场棋盘变为金色。期间击杀的敌人掉落的$与灵魂变为 !X! 倍。
冷却时间 !CD! 秒。

ability_descriptions.name: 战线
ability_descriptions.simple_description:
战线在最前方承受所有敌人的攻击，其受到攻击会消耗城防值。
 主动：为战线补充城防值，其数值为你DPS的 !X! %。多次获取的城防值可以叠加，但是获取量会衰减。
冷却时间 !CD! 秒。
